title: Riot: Champ Select Improvement
body:
Allow our champ select screen to be able to show what champs we have earned our chests on and allow them to show our mastery and be organized alphabetically, by recently played, and by highest mastery like n the collections page.

Now we won't have to spend time on the collections page before entering queue trying to figure out who to play to get our available chest or who we want to play to level up their mastery because we are close to the next level, it will all be available during champ select.


It might not be your priority, but this quality of life change would immensely make champion select a much more enjoyable process. Thank you all for your time and consideration.

replies.body: We hear you and while I cannot give you any timeline, we might have a solution for this. Hang tight!
